summary: An inspiring look at JK Rowling's rise to become one of the most influential writers-from her humble beginnings as an imaginative young girl and awkward teenager to the loss of her mother and the genesis of the Harry Potter phenomenon.
cast: Poppy Montgomery|Emily Holmes|Antonio Cupo|Janet Kidder|Madison Desjarlais|Andy Maton|Aislyn Watson|Marie West|Lisa Norton|Paul McGillion|Sarah Desjardins|Christine Chatelain|Wesley MacInnes|Patti Allan|Greigh Laschuk|Charles Jarman|Glynis Davies|Andrew Kavadas|Evan Bird|Gina Stockdale|Kirsten Slenning|Kirsten Robek|Loretta Walsh|Jacqui Kaese|Eliza Faria|Michael Patric|Olivia Wakehams|Ivan Wanis-Ruiz|Diego Bedoya|Lee Vincent|Beatrice King|Beatrice Zeilinger|Lindsay Lomax|James Kot|Terri Anne Taylor|Derek Gilroy|Taya Clyne|Graison Foster|Douglas Abel|Gabriel Patrich|Lilah Fitzgerald|Fortune Aknin|Jack Spong|Sophia Bosley|Alanna Babic-Day|Chloe Johnson|Emma Dzaman|Michael Coleman|Matthew Hughes|Sean Kristian|Micha Baum|Denis Corbett|Yolanda Corbett|Richard Cummins|Marlo Franson|Kerri Jesson|Julia Rhodes|J.K. Rowling|Christian J. Stewart|Stewart Whitworth
keywords: jk rowling|harry potter|what happened to epilogue|ends with biographical notes|ends with real life footage
title: Magia más allá de las palabras
